trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick> event occurs when the user clicks a panel on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick>evento ocorre quando o usuário clica em um painel em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick>

trans-unit.source: A StatusBarPanelClickEventArgs specifies which <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> was clicked, the mouse button that was pressed, how many times it was pressed, and the coordinates of the mouse click at the time the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Um StatusBarPanelClickEventArgs Especifica qual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>foi clicado, botão do mouse foi pressionado, quantas vezes ela foi pressionada e as coordenadas do clique do mouse no momento em que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>foi clicado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: You can use the data provided by this class in an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick> event to perform tasks related to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> being clicked.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar os dados fornecidos por essa classe em um manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick>evento para executar tarefas relacionadas para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>ser clicado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> is used to display the time, you could create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick> event and use data provided by this class to display a dialog box that allows you to modify the date and time on the system.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>é usado para exibir a hora, você pode criar um manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick>dados de uso e eventos fornecidos por essa classe para exibir uma caixa de diálogo que permite que você modifique a data e hora do sistema.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelClickEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelClickEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> that represents the panel that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref> que representa o painel que foi clicado.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons"></xref> values that represents the mouse buttons that were clicked while over the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons"> </xref> valores que representa os botões de mouse foram clicados enquanto sobre o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The number of times that the mouse button was clicked.
trans-unit.target: O número de vezes que o botão do mouse foi clicado.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the mouse click.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada x do clique do mouse.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the mouse click.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada y do clique do mouse.

trans-unit.source: The StatusBarPanel property enables you to obtain the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade StatusBarPanel permite que você obtenha o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>que foi clicado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: You can use this within the event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick> event of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control to perform tasks such as displaying custom dialog boxes when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar isso no manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick>eventos de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>caixas de controle para executar tarefas como exibir a caixa de diálogo personalizada quando um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>dentro de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controle é clicado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick>
